detectors.description:
OBEE._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#214-225) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#217)
detectors.markdown:
[OBEE._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#L214-L225) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#L217)

detectors.description:
OBEE.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#123-132) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,OBEE::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#130)
detectors.markdown:
[OBEE.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#L123-L132) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

detectors.description: Constant OBEE.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#19) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

OBEE.slitherConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#8-253) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 12000000000e18 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OBEE.sol#19)

detectors.description:
delegate(address) should be declared external:

getPriorVotes(address,uint256) should be declared external:
